preSchool.title: Play-School and Daycare
preSchool.details: For young infants of age less than 3 years. The guiding principle for the PlaySchool program is to help child master the skills needed to succeed in school and in life. Program introduces your children to a more structured day with stimulating activities, group interaction and numerous opportunities to be inquisitive as he/she travels along the path to discover.

preSchool.title: Kindergarten
preSchool.details: A kindergarten is a preschool educational approach traditionally based on playing, singing, practical activities such as drawing, and social interaction as part of the transition from home to school. Kindergarten aims at preparing children for primary school education, thereby ensuring a smooth transition from Pre-School to primary school.
